I meant to say press F8
i was dwnloading at 500KBs now just jropped to 22KBs did this happen to u guys???

Worked perfectly!!! Clean. No virus. Thanks

How to Install it

1. Run the Norton setup

2. Complete Installation

3. Run it as trial

4. Restart

5. Restart again and hit F8 key to run windows safe mode

6. Now double click and run the crack

7. Restart after finishing the crack setup 

8. Norton will crash after restarting

9. Uninstall the Norton and restart again

10. Reinstall Norton again

11. Restart

12. Open Norton

13. You'll see 31939 days remaining

14. Done!

I used Windows XP
This is GREAT, Thanks so much
